name: Mobile application developer
qualification: Android or iOS Development skills
Familier with Java / Kotlin / Swift / React Native / Vue Native development
Good knowledge with OOP concepts
Understanding of Google's material design guidelines (for Android development) / Apple's Human interface guidelines (for iOS development)
Some product portfolio
Experience with third-party libraries & frameworks and APIs

name: Web developer
qualification: Quality skills in JavaScript, HTML, CSS
Proficient in My SQL
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
Solid ability in both written and verbal communication
Knowledge of programming language and technical terminology
Able to develop ideas and processes and clearly express them
Able to solve complex problems

name: Software developer
qualification: Windows / Mac development skills
Quality skills of the SDLC
Java / Python / C++ / Scala / Swift development skills
Familiar with OOP concepts
Some product portfolio
Ability to managing database

name: Information technology vendor manager
qualification: Developing and sustaining long-standing relationships with clients.
Meeting with suitable clients to assess their products, inquire about their services
Continually monitoring sales trends to determine which products are more popular
Conducting interviews with new client to understand & increase product quality

name: Content Writer
qualification: Quality skills of Communications, Marketing, English, Journalism, Writing
Good at SEO content writing and Keyword planning
Some good articles portfolio
The ability to work in a fast-paced environment
The ability to handle multiple projects concurrently

name: Analyst
qualification: Quality skills to understand the needs of the product
Translate the requirement to real-time project
Monitoring the projects
Inspect software or web

name: Quality Tester
qualification: Analyzing users stories and/use cases/requirements for validity and feasibility
Collaborate closely with other team members and departments
Execute all levels of testing (System, Integration, and Regression)
Design and develop automation scripts when needed
Detect and track products defects and inconsistencies
Provide timely solutions
Apply quality engineering principals throughout the product lifecycle
Provide support and documentation
